headline.main: U.S. Air Force Leader Sees Russia as 'Biggest Threat'
headline.print_headline: U.S. Air Force Leader Sees Russia as 'Biggest Threat'

docs.snippet: Russia is the biggest threat to U.S. national security and America must boost its military presence throughout Europe even as NATO allies face budget challenges and scale back spending, U.S. Air Force Secretary Deborah James said on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Russia is the biggest threat to U.S. national security and America must boost its military presence throughout Europe even as NATO allies face budget challenges and scale back spending, U.S. Air Force Secretary Deborah James said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Rise in Japan Machinery Orders Boosts Capex, Economic Outlook
headline.print_headline: Rise in Japan Machinery Orders Boosts Capex, Economic Outlook

docs.snippet: Japan's core machinery orders in May unexpectedly grew for a third straight month, with the total value reaching a 7-year high and adding to recent evidence of a steady pickup in business spending seen as vital for a durable economic recovery....
docs.lead_paragraph: Japan's core machinery orders in May unexpectedly grew for a third straight month, with the total value reaching a 7-year high and adding to recent evidence of a steady pickup in business spending seen as vital for a durable economic recovery.

headline.main: California Hispanic Population Outstrips White: Census
headline.print_headline: California Hispanic Population Outstrips White: Census

docs.snippet: California's Hispanic population now outnumbers the white population, U.S. Census data shows, marking a long-predicted shift in the country's most populous state....
docs.lead_paragraph: California's Hispanic population now outnumbers the white population, U.S. Census data shows, marking a long-predicted shift in the country's most populous state.

headline.main: N.Y. Giants Star Pierre-Paul Has Finger Amputated: ESPN
headline.print_headline: N.Y. Giants Star Pierre-Paul Has Finger Amputated: ESPN

docs.snippet: New York Giants star defensive end Jason Pierre-Paul had his right index finger amputated on Wednesday after a fireworks accident, ESPN reported, citing medical records....
docs.lead_paragraph: New York Giants star defensive end Jason Pierre-Paul had his right index finger amputated on Wednesday after a fireworks accident, ESPN reported, citing medical records.

headline.main: Toshiba Considering Selling Part of Westinghouse: Sources
headline.print_headline: Toshiba Considering Selling Part of Westinghouse: Sources

docs.snippet: Toshiba Corp, which is expected to mark down past profits due to an accounting scandal, is considering selling assets including part of its stake in Westinghouse Electric, sources with knowledge of the matter said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Toshiba Corp, which is expected to mark down past profits due to an accounting scandal, is considering selling assets including part of its stake in Westinghouse Electric, sources with knowledge of the matter said on Thursday.

headline.main: Doctors’ Notes for Pregnant Employees Can Backfire, Experts Warn
headline.print_headline: Vague or Ill-Timed Doctor’s Note for Pregnant Women Can Backfire, Experts Warn

docs.snippet: Unspecific or poorly timed notes seeking accommodations can bring harsh responses from women’s employers....
docs.abstract: Unspecific or poorly timed notes seeking accommodations can bring harsh responses from women’s employers.

headline.main: Lawmakers Bash U.S. Army Plan to Cut 57,000 Troops and Civilians
headline.print_headline: Lawmakers Bash U.S. Army Plan to Cut 57,000 Troops and Civilians

docs.snippet: Lawmakers on Wednesday sharply criticized long-announced U.S. Army plans to cut nearly 60,000 soldiers and civilian personnel due to tight budgets, warning it was risky and short-sighted at a time of Middle East conflict and rising tensions with R...
docs.lead_paragraph: Lawmakers on Wednesday sharply criticized long-announced U.S. Army plans to cut nearly 60,000 soldiers and civilian personnel due to tight budgets, warning it was risky and short-sighted at a time of Middle East conflict and rising tensions with Russia.

headline.main: Settlement Allows Families to Visit Graves in New York Potter's Field
headline.print_headline: Settlement Allows Families to Visit Graves in New York Potter's Field

docs.snippet: Families whose loved ones lie in a New York City potter's field for unclaimed bodies or those unable to afford burials will be able to visit the gravesites for the first time under a settlement announced on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Families whose loved ones lie in a New York City potter's field for unclaimed bodies or those unable to afford burials will be able to visit the gravesites for the first time under a settlement announced on Wednesday.

headline.main: Investigator: House Explosion Planners Didn't Know Its Force
headline.print_headline: Investigator: House Explosion Planners Didn't Know Its Force

docs.snippet: Whoever filled an Indianapolis home with natural gas and poured gasoline in two rooms probably did not know the mixture would create the powerful explosion that gutted a neighborhood three years ago, killing two neighbors and damaging more than 80...
docs.lead_paragraph: Whoever filled an Indianapolis home with natural gas and poured gasoline in two rooms probably did not know the mixture would create the powerful explosion that gutted a neighborhood three years ago, killing two neighbors and damaging more than 80 homes, an independent fire investigator testified Wednesday.
